name: Dusttale: Dustbelief
description:
Hello there! Welcome to the official Inky's Dustbelief.

By the way, the game it's already 20% done [ With a playable demo! With Story, Title screen, Last corridor, and the Phase I ]

< Credits >

  - Under fusion tale [ Original ] - Samuel Wolfang

  - Under fusion tale [ Updated ] - McatR

 - Overworld engine - InkyG

 - Phase I Attacks - InkyG & McatR

 - Phase I sprites - TAD7

 - Phase I music - Fn4fdamusicdude

 - Sans & Gaster blasters sprites - Samuel25253

 - Karmic Amelioration - Prittxus Zone, FloweyDev

 - Papyrus overworld sprite - Ocascraft

 - Intro sprites  [ Updated - Better version ] - Javi25

 - Titlescreen Papyrus and Sans draw - TAD7

 - Fight buttons - R3pixelz

 - Dialogues fixed [ Better english patch ] - Dedede, Misterkaze Presents

 - Dedede, Dario, Unibrine [ Translators] - ( There's Just English languague on this demo )

 - Ufmemesans/Misterkaze/Drbright - Dusttrust Au ( Inspiration. )

 - Frisk overworld - Goncho

 - Title screen music - Ufmemesans

If I forget to mention you on the credits please, tell me on discord!
